search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Payhip (payhip.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.

[Get started free](https://payhip.com/auth/register) [Login](https://payhip.com/auth/login)

Simple pricing
==============

Get started now. No credit card required.
-----------------------------------------

[Signup for free](https://payhip.com/auth/register)

Free Forever
------------

$ 0 /mo

+5% transaction fee

*   All features
*   Unlimited products
*   Unlimited revenue

Plus
----

$ 29 /mo

+2% transaction fee

*   All features
*   Unlimited products
*   Unlimited revenue

Pro
---

$ 99 /mo

No transaction fee

*   All features
*   Unlimited products
*   Unlimited revenue

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

### Do I need to pay PayPal/Stripe fees?

Yes, PayPal and Stripe will still charge at their standard rates once they complete a transaction. This applies for all plans.

### How can my customers pay?

Customers can pay with their PayPal account or their card. Visa, MasterCard, American Express, JCB, Discover, and Diners Club and more.

### Why do all plans have the same features?

At Payhip, our goal is to make pricing as simple and transparent as possible. So, no feature-gating here! You'll get access to all of our amazing features to help you grow your business, even on our free plan.

### Can I cancel my account at anytime?

Absolutely, you'll be able to cancel your account whenever you'd like if you decide we're not for you.

### When do I get paid?

We will deposit your sales to you immediately after a transaction has been completed. Not quite the speed of light, but close.

### Do you offer charity discounts?

For sure, we love to support great causes of all kinds so please get in touch with us and we'll help setup a discount for your account.

### How do I manage my taxes?

Payhip is fully compliant to collect and remit EU VAT and UK on your behalf automatically. You can also set up any other taxes with Payhip and we report these to you.

### How can I contact you?

Just shoot us an email at [contact@payhip.com](mailto:contact@payhip.com) or reach out to us on [Twitter](http://twitter.com/payhip). We'd love to chat!

[![Image 3](https://payhip.com/images/designv2/logo/logo.svg)](https://payhip.com/)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: All plans include the same features, with differences in transaction fees.

Paid plan with no transaction fees.
